backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the chat application backend with types and logic for chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active users, and access control, using ordered maps for storage and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI features—adding text labels to message action buttons in MessageBubble.tsx and removing numeric character count text in MessageInput.tsx—to their affected files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key behaviors of components, pages, hooks, and configuration files in the React frontend.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with cache-busting meta tags, a root div, and a versioned module script tag pointing to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom (with messageId search param), and admin routes, conditionally rendering the Header and Footer based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component allowing users to update their avatar by uploading an image file, selecting a GIF from a Giphy search/trending feed, or removing their current avatar.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that renders messages, handles sending, reply context, auto-scroll to bottom, and scroll-to-target-message with highlight for deep-linked messages.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a card for a chatroom with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, displaying topic, stats, and live status badges.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating a new chatroom with fields for topic, description, category, and media (image upload, video URL, or Twitter post).
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDisc: Dialog that warns users before navigating to an external URL, showing the target link and requiring confirmation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with the Chattr logo, back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom routes, and an inline username editor with avatar picker.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that renders nothing, explicitly noting that authentication is not used in this app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders an individual chat message with support for reactions, pinning, replies, media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, GIFs), voice playback, reporting, and external link warnings.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, image uploads, GIF search via Giphy, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in typed text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video embed within a chatroom, with an unpin button that calls the useUnpinVideo mutation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: A voice message player component with play/pause controls, a seekable waveform visualization, and time display, supporting multiple audio instances by pausing others on play.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: A generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the latest stable value after the delay elapses.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures a fresh chatroom list is fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale or empty cached entries and explicitly refetching the canonical chatrooms query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity persistence, and status tracking via a React context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central React Query hooks file covering chatroom fetching, message operations, reactions, image upload, username/avatar management, and mutations like pinning videos and sending messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens), and includes mobile-specific input styles and custom voice message range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants including the Giphy API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Exports a single utility function `formatCompactNumber` that formats numbers into compact human-readable strings (k, M, B suffixes).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy and fetch trending GIFs via the Giphy API, returning normalized GIF objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a lazy-loader for the html2canvas library.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses image files using an HTML canvas, with configurable max dimensions, quality, and progress callback.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter embed rendering utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) with in-flight deduplication and localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage cache layer for Twitter oEmbed preview data, supporting versioned entries with a 7-day expiration and cache key derivation from tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail fetching utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail caching utility.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video/post IDs and generating thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Password-protected admin moderation page that lists chatrooms with flagged message counts, supports filtering, and allows admins to delete chatrooms via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, increments its view count on load, and renders the ChatArea component; handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying a searchable, filterable, and algorithmically sorted list of chatrooms with options to create a new chatroom and navigate into existing ones.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Chattr app tracking existing features and pending feature requests, including adding text labels to message action buttons and removing the character count display from the message input.
